class.name: SiMMLTrack
class.description: Sequencers contain a collection of tracks to be able to process multiple overlapping commands at the same time. Tracks are used as they are needed by the sequence, and then become reserved for future reuse.

method.name: get_track_id
method.description: Returns the track ID component of the internal ID.

method.name: get_track_type_id
method.description: Returns the track type component of the internal ID.
